articles.author: Al Jazeera
articles.title: Biden writes two different letters on Gaza war, reflecting his US audience - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: Messages to pro-Palestinian and pro-Israel Americans aren’t contradictory but it’s an uncommon White House practice.
articles.content: United States President Joe Biden has delivered two different messages on the Israel-Hamas war to pro-Palestinian and pro-Israel Americans, NBC News has reported, based on copies of official White Ho… [+3926 chars]
